channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-14000] (ORC) Changing a numeric type column of a partitioned table to lower type set values to something other than 'NULL'
item.description: When an integer column is changed to a type that is smaller (e.g. bigint to int) and set hive.metastore.disallow.incompatible.col.type.changes=false, the data is clipped instead of being NULL.
item.summary: (ORC) Changing a numeric type column of a partitioned table to lower type set values to something other than 'NULL'

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
